asset.prompt: A cinematic, hyper-detailed, slightly unsettling upper-body character portrait of Brad, a pre-teen boy with a cautious expression. He is the wimpy friend, with neatly combed brown hair and slightly wide, nervous eyes. He is wearing a 90s-style striped polo shirt. The scene is illuminated by the ambient glow of a carnival at night, creating a suspenseful atmosphere. The overall style emphasizes detailed textures and a slightly distorted, wide-angle perspective.
